name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Breaking news! Netizen contribution
Tonight in Zhoukou, Henan, a dispute arose due to fireworks. The police tried to take away the people who set off the fireworks. People surrounded the police car and demanded that they release the people. In the end, the police car was overturned.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Netizens added

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: At the scene, a young man stood on a police car and performed a flower-shaking gesture.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: A young man wearing Balenciaga shows the police car license plate he removed to the public

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Scenes of people overturning police cars

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
In another video, a police car tried to leave but was blocked by the public. Someone sat on the police car to prevent it from leaving.
The driver then got out of the car to negotiate with the public.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Follow-up:

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizens added follow-up 
The video shows that the special police and firefighters entered the scene and then arrested the two young men.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: @ATO8964 The biggest contradiction in setting off fireworks is actually the same as banning electric bicycles. You can buy them everywhere, but once you set them off, you are breaking the law.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Netizens added: Balenciaga boy dancing on police car

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: After the police car was overturned, people came forward to take selfies with the police car

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Netizens added that the specific location of the incident

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
It is said that this boy posted a Kuaishou post at 5 am on January 3rd
saying "one person does one thing and one person takes responsibility, don't let my parents get involved"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizens added another perspective before the police car was overturned
The video shows that the people surrounded the police car and demanded to release the people. A policeman opened the door to try to prove that there was no one in the car, but at this time the emotions of the people at the scene were out of control, and someone shouted "Call the police car."
Then someone threw a drink at the police, and the crowd began to hit the police car. The police wanted to drive away, but was stopped by the crowd. Some people began to climb onto the police car, and the people around shouted "Release the people."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
User contribution
Ping An Luyi issued an announcement, and the arrest photos circulated online

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
Zhoukou Luyi Education and Sports Bureau held an emergency meeting today
Emphasizing that ideological education will be carried out in a timely manner to educate students on gratitude, and at the same time, all units should avoid the problem of petitioning beyond the level.
And emphasized that teachers should try not to go out.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Compared to being the first to adopt a four-and-a-half-day work week, I am more shocked that LeEco is still alive...

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: User contributions

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: @mengs04468598 Actually, they made a lot of noise on Weibo, but the popularity has dropped significantly. Many students have no place to speak out, but I can’t post here because there are too many people. Every day, students from more than 20 schools all over the country ask for help. I can’t do anything about it. So my opinion is that you should save yourself.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Maybe it’s because we live in an age where lies are everywhere, so telling the truth requires “hard work”.
